title: How to start a writing career - Online Business Titans - Quora

response.answer_text: To be a writer there is only one thing you have to do. Write. Moreover, you should enjoy writing. If you don't like to write, do something else. Writing, like composing, is an art form. It requires talent to be successful.

It depends on what section of writing you wish to partake. Do you want to be a novelist, essayist, poet, blogger, journalist, etc. You need to determine what is your interest then emulate those who are successful in that same career path.
Get a college degree. By the time you’re finished, you’ll have a much better idea of how to start.
